regen.absent_element: action to handle failure of driver confirmation
regen.new_specification: The system shall trigger an alarm or intervention if the driver fails to confirm automatic transfer to Shunting operation within a specified timeframe.

regen.absent_element: driver confirmation for manual selection of Shunting
regen.new_specification: The system shall require driver confirmation when manually selecting Shunting from Stand By operation, Full Supervision operation or Partial Supervision operation.

regen.absent_element: action when Shunting operation is manually selected from Stand By operation
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically transfer to Shunting operation and supervise the speed when Shunting is manually selected from Stand By operation.

label: Before authomatic transition to Shunting, ETCS shall request confirmation from the driver.
absence: confirmation from the driver if authomatic transition to Shunting
